title: Binance Reportedly Lays Off Over 1,000 Employees, CZ Says Exchange Is Hiring
description: Leading crypto exchange Binance has cut hundreds of jobs after a string of executive exits, according to a media report. The news, which comes as the coin trading platform marks its sixth anniversary amid increased pressure from regulators, was termed as FUD by founder Changpeng Zhao who said his company is still hiring. Major Digital […]

title: Russia and Southeast Asia embrace local currencies
description: As a seismic shift echoes through the world of international commerce, Russia has initiated discussions on conducting trade with ten Southeast Asian nations through their respective national currencies. These nations are members of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), comprising Brunei, Cambodia, Indonesia, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam. This strategic maneuver ... Read more

title: Actors Demand Stronger Protection Against AI Digital Doubles, Reminiscent of Black Mirror
description: In a scenario reminiscent of an episode from the popular TV series “Black Mirror,” the Screen Actors Guild-American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (SAG-AFTRA) has initiated a historic strike against major studios, emphasizing the need for enhanced safeguards concerning the use of AI-generated digital replicas of performers. The union is concerned that these digital ... Read more

title: $992,000,000,000 Banking Giants Fined for Role in Global Billion-Dollar Payments Scheme
description:
Three banking giants and an additional financial institution are paying a multimillion-dollar fine for their role in a global billion-dollar fintech scam. The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has fined DBS, OCBC, Citibank Singapore and Swiss Life for violating anti-money laundering and anti-terror financing laws connected to the $2.1 billion Wirecard AG scam. The MAS […]

The post $992,000,000,000 Banking Giants Fined for Role in Global Billion-Dollar Payments Scheme appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: CME Bitcoin Futures Price Premium Suggests US Crypto Investors Are Bullish, Says Analytics Firm IntoTheBlock
description:
The Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME) Bitcoin (BTC) futures are priced at a premium, suggesting that US-based market participants are optimistic about crypto, according to the analytics firm IntoTheBlock. Lucas Outumuro, IntoTheBlock’s head of research, notes in a new analysis that BTC futures on the CME have been consistently higher than on international futures exchanges since […]

The post CME Bitcoin Futures Price Premium Suggests US Crypto Investors Are Bullish, Says Analytics Firm IntoTheBlock appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
